<<<<<<< HEAD
A Very godly song intituled, The earnest petition of a faithfull Christian, being clarke of Bodnam, made vpon his death bed, at the instant of his transmutation to a pleasant new tune. Clarke of Bodnam.
1 sheet ([1] p.) : ill.
For H.G., Printed at London : [1624?]
Date of publication suggested by STC (2nd ed.). Contains two illustrations. Right half of sheet contains: The second part of the clarke of Bodnam, to the same tune. Reproduction of original in: Pepys Library.
=======

For H.G., Printed at London : [1624?]
